sourcesContent:
import StyledButton from "../atoms/styledButton"
import {  
    TableContainer, 
    Table,
    TableHead, 
    TableBody, 
    TableRow, 
    TableCell,
    TextField,
} from '@mui/material'
import { Paper } from '@mui/material'
import { Box, Grid } from '@mui/material'

import EditDeleteButton from "../molecules/editDeleteButton"
import ChoosePayedByButton from "../molecules/choosePayedByButton"
import { paymentState } from "../../recoil/atoms"

import CreditCardIcon from '@mui/icons-material/CreditCard'
import MonetizationOnIcon from '@mui/icons-material/MonetizationOn'

import ValueEditTextFieldCost from "../molecules/valueEditTextFieldCost"
import ValueEditTextFieldName from "../molecules/valueEditTextFieldCost copy"
import ValueEditTextFieldCategory from "../molecules/valueEditTextFieldCategory"
import ValueEditTextFieldDate from "../molecules/valueEditTextFieldDate"

function CrudUnit(props: any) {
    const payment = props.payment

    return(
        <>
        {props.payment.onEdit ?
            <TableRow>
                <TableCell>
                    <EditDeleteButton 
                        key={payment.id+"id"}
                        payment={payment}
                    />
                </TableCell> 
                <ValueEditTextFieldCost payment={payment} />
                <ValueEditTextFieldName payment={payment} />
                <ValueEditTextFieldCategory payment={payment} />
                <TableCell>
                    <ChoosePayedByButton
                        key={payment.id+"payedBy"}
                        payment={payment}
                    />
                </TableCell>
                <ValueEditTextFieldDate payment={payment} />
            </TableRow>
        :
            <TableRow>
                <TableCell>
                    <EditDeleteButton 
                        key={payment.id+"id"}
                        payment={payment}
                    />
                </TableCell> 
                <TableCell>
                    {payment.cost+" 円"}
                </TableCell>
                <TableCell>
                    {payment.name}
                </TableCell>
                <TableCell>
                    {payment.category}
                </TableCell>
                <TableCell>
                    {payment.payedBy === 'credit' ? <CreditCardIcon/> : <MonetizationOnIcon/>}
                </TableCell>
                <TableCell>
                    {payment.date}
                </TableCell>
            </TableRow>
        }
        </>
        
    )
}

export default CrudUnit

            <TableCell>
                <EditDeleteButton 
                    key={props.payment.id+"id"}
                    payment={props.payment}
                />
            </TableCell> 
            <TableCell>
                {props.payment.cost+" 円"}
            </TableCell>
            <TableCell>
                {props.payment.name}
            </TableCell>
            <TableCell>
                {props.payment.category}
            </TableCell>
            <TableCell>
                {props.payment.payedBy === 'credit' ? <CreditCardIcon/> : <MonetizationOnIcon/>}
            </TableCell>
            <TableCell>
                {props.payment.date}
            </TableCell>
            {props.payment.onEdit &&
                <TableCell>
                <ChoosePayedByButton
                    key={props.payment.id+"payedBy"}
                    payment={props.payment}
                />
                </TableCell>
            } 
        </TableRow>
    */
